definition: having or occurring in several distinct forms
details:
adjective
- having or occurring in several distinct forms
= example: having or occurring in several distinct forms
= synonyms: polymorphous
- relating to the occurrence of more than one kind of individual (independent of sexual differences) in an interbreeding population
= example: relating to the occurrence of more than one kind of individual (independent of sexual differences) in an interbreeding population
= synonyms: polymorphous
- relating to the crystallization of a compound in two or more different forms
= synonyms: polymorphous
